{{Quote|A crowned skull: The Manwoodys of Kingsgrave.|[[Podrick Payne]]|Two Swords}}
[[Image:Kingsgrave Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Kingsgrave on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Kingsgrave''' is a castle in [[Dorne]], the region controlled by [[House Martell]] of [[Sunspear]], and the seat of [[House Manwoody]]. The castle is located in the north-west of Dorne near the border with [[the Stormlands]]. It is east of the [[Prince's Pass]] and west of the [[Kingsroad]], located deep within the [[Red Mountains]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/dorne/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Dorne entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels Kingsgrave is the seat of [[House Manwoody]], a loyal vassal house of the Martells.
